alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Frederick; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 10:49AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT CARROLL COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND...NORTHWESTERN HOWARD AND NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND...FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND...NORTHWESTERN BALTIMORE COUNTY IN NORTHERN MARYLAND AND NORTHERN LOUDOUN COUNTIES IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA... Snow will coat the ground in spots late this morning, and with temperatures near freezing this may coat untreated surfaces as well. Wind gusts around 30 to 40 mph combined with the snow may reduce visibility to near one-half mile at times. Locations impacted include... Frederick, Westminster, Damascus, Thurmont, Emmitsburg, Harry Grove Stadium, Eldersburg, Reisterstown, Ballenger Creek, Mount Airy, Purcellville, Taneytown, Hampstead, Brunswick, Walkersville, Manchester, Sykesville, Braddock Heights, Oakland, and New Market. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Maryland between mile markers 45 and 75. Interstate 270 in Maryland between mile markers 21 and 32. Be prepared for slippery surfaces when traveling. Slow down and allow extra time to get to your destination.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Frederick; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery
